beer.name: Morimoto Black Obi Soba
beer.description: A richer version of our Soba Ale with the addition of specialty malts and a special blend of hops to give it a fuller, nutty flavor while retaining a clean, crisp finish.
beer.grains: Roasted Soba, Harrington, Metcalf, Munich, C-15, C-60 and Carafa Special No. 2
Roasted Soba, Harrington, Metcalf, Munich, C-15, C-60 and Carafa Special No. 2
beer.yeast: Rogue's Pacman Yeast & Free Range Coastal Wate
